name: Cubigo
0:
”Alexa, ask my community what is on my schedule Today”
”Alexa, ask my community which commands I can use”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my community
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Cubigo skill enables you as a resident to retrieve information provided by your senior living community. Personalized information is made accessible about your schedule, upcoming community events, dining menus, and real-time community updates.
 

[Disclaimer]
This app is operational only when invited by a senior living community after they have implemented the separate Cubigo Administration Software. Consult a team member, healthcare professional or government guidelines should you have additional concerns about allergies, dietary restrictions or food safety and handling. 

For more information about Cubigo for your community, contact your community administration, or Cubigo at info@cubigo.com.
